Only way Republican Senators will be able to hope for a "next term" will be to oppose DeVos. We will move heaven and earth to defeat them.

For as much as Trump and his followers hated Obama and his associates they sure as hell love plagiarizing their work.
Our nation's most vulnerable have been sold to the highest bidder. Senators voting for DeVos have OK'd a future we may never recover from.
@ShellshockMama @SenatorBurr @NCPolicyWatch This is heartbreaking. Our nation's most vulnerable have been sold to the highest bidder.
@SenatorBurr It's an important day because you just single-handedly screwed them all.
@brooklynrichied @lisamurkowski Remember this Alaska. End her career the way she's ending the opportunity for your children. Vote. Her. Out.

@marcorubio As my representative I want to know what you are doing against this unconstitutional development? Fight Trump! #MuslimBan
@asamjulian stop hiding your pathetic weak mind behind a guise of a patriotism you clearly don't understand.
NOTHING American about a #MuslimBan. Anyone calling themselves a patriot needs to be MAD AS HELL. We are better than this ignorance.

Apparently GOP #MarchForLife folks think a fetus can survive if its mother doesn't have clean air, water, or access to food and medicine.
@Impeach_D_Trump @realDonaldTrump Higher than I expected. How do we get it lower.

I take solace that in an alternate dimension, POTUS @BernieSanders is doing the EXACT OPPOSITE of everything that's happening right now.
I'm glad that scientists and the educated are finally getting pissed off. Now the ignorant can STFU and let the adults take it from here.
Adding to the list of Democrats that hate women: @RepCuellar, @RepLipinski, @collinpeterson. Now we know who to vote out ladies.
You know why @realDonaldTrump is signing all of this legislation against protestors? He knows shit is about to get REALLY real in America.
@ZecTurd Again, I don't see a problem with that photo. So if you're trying to insult me you're only making yourself look like an ass.
@ZecTurd Harvard teaches people how to compose coherent sentences. Hell even the 3rd grade does that.
@GaultTodd I no longer trust the government, least of all this one. Hence my rage today. There is nothing he has done I am proud of.
@GaultTodd Also, the president doesn't even PAY taxes so why does he gets to say where MY money goes? I'm fine with my money helping women.
@GaultTodd It can be a life-saving procedure for women. But ban it because there aren't more important things that need to be addressed.
@GaultTodd I just can't comprehend people defending policies that hurt every day people all for the sake of the rich getting richer.
@GaultTodd That's unfortunately a myopic view of the world my friend. We need corporations, billionaires (and Presidents) to pay their taxes
@GaultTodd The Hyde Amendment has been preventing Federal dollars from going to abortion since 1976.
@GaultTodd The Mexico City Policy harms women. It actual makes abortions more dangerous. Doesn't stop them. Increase their rates actually.
@GaultTodd TAX PAYER MONEY NEVER GOES TO ABORTIONS. EVER. How can people not comprehend this? IT. NEVER. GOES. TO. ABORTIONS. EVER.
We could afford all this "free shit" Republicans don't want us to have if people like POTUS paid their taxes like the rest of us.
@GaultTodd You're right and I apologize.
@GaultTodd Global Gag Rule reinstated by Trump. Ironic that it's cheered by "Pro Life" advocates because FACTS prove it increases abortions.
@GaultTodd It's called sarcasm. I know it's considered a sophisticated form of humor and discourse, but try and stick with me here...
@ZecTurd What's your point? Worried her dick is bigger than yours? You know what the world needs less of - insecure, sad little men like you
@GaultTodd He's too ignorant to admit it's too expensive (even though it is). Blacking out EPA, Signing bills against women's rights, etc...
#ThankYouTrump for deciding a wall is too expensive so you'll just ruin the country and make it non desirable for ANYONE instead.
#ThankYouTrump for showing us Americans in 4 days how North Koreans have lived their whole lives. #dictator #freeEPA #TinyHands
@LifeNewsHQ You are pro-babies being born, but yet every policy you're applauding being passed simply increases abortion rates. #nologic.
@LifeNewsHQ Trying to alleviate your ignorance isn't trolling. But I get it, some people are just happy being ignorant. Carry on.
